text:
Multi-output CNN Model
As with multiple input series, there is another more elaborate way to model the problem. Each
output series can be handled by a separate output CNN model. We can refer to this as a
multi-output CNN model. It may oﬀer more ﬂexibility or better performance depending on the
speciﬁcs of the problem that is being modeled. This type of model can be deﬁned in Keras
using the Keras functional API. First, we can deﬁne the ﬁrst input model as a 1D CNN model.
